MongoId.description: The unique identifier generated by MongoDB for the auction.

AuctionEndDate.description: The end date of the auction.

ArtifactID.description: The ID of the artifact associated with the auction.

CurrentBid.description: The current bid amount in the auction.

FinalBid.description: The final bid placed in the auction. It refers to the Bid object.

BidHistory.description: The history of bids placed in the auction. Each item refers to a Bid object.
